Question: This person graduated in 1955 with a bachelor's degree in aeronautical engineering.
Hints: In return, this person gave Wendt a ticket for a "space taxi" "good between two planets".
This person and his Apollo 11 crewmates were the 1999 recipients of the Langley Gold Medal from the Smithsonian Institution.
Sizemore, unable to get the hair back, decided to donate the proceeds to the charity of this person's choice.
